summary.span: 显示一个复选框，允许用户选择 或 条件。

span.span: Displays a check box that allows the user to select a or condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#Introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#DeclarativeSyntax) ## 介绍Introduction 使用 控件允许用户选择 `true` 或 `false` 状态。Use the control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state. 如果计划使用多个 控件，则 控件是一种提供便利的数据绑定功能的替代控件。If you plan to use multiple controls, the control is an alternative control that provides convenient data binding capabilities. 不过，单个 控件提供对布局的更大控制。However, individual controls provide greater control over layout. > [!IMPORTANT] > 控件接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。A control accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 移动 Web pages 验证用户输入不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET mobile Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 控件来指示销售额是否包含在销售总计的计算中。The following example demonstrates how to use a control to indicate whether tax is included in the calculation for a sales total. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在单击时 状态是否自动回发到服务器。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the state automatically posts back to the server when clicked.

value.span: 为 ，则在单击 控件时自动将其状态发送到服务器，否则为 。

span.span: to automatically post the state of the control to the server when it is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可指定在单击时是否将 控件的状态回发到服务器。Use this property to specify whether the state of the control is posted back to the server when clicked. > [!NOTE] > 如果将此属性设置为 `true`，则每次单击该控件时，都会往返服务器。Setting this property to `true` causes a round trip to the server every time the control is clicked. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性在单击控件时将 控件的状态自动发布到服务器。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to automatically post the state of the control to the server when the control is clicked. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当选中 控件时是否执行验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the control is selected.

value.span: 如果在单击 时执行验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if validation is performed when the is clicked; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以确定在选择 控件时是否同时在客户端和服务器上执行验证。Use the property to determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when a control is selected. 页验证确定与页上的验证控件关联的输入控件是否都通过验证控件指定的验证规则。Page validation determines whether the input controls that are associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules as specified by the validation control. 默认情况下，单击 控件不会导致页验证。By default, clicking a control does not cause page validation. 若要在单击 控件时执行页验证，请将 属性设置为 "`true`"。To perform page validation when the control is clicked, set the property to `true`. 当 属性的值设置为 `true`时，还可以使用 属性来指定 控件对其进行验证的验证组的名称。When the value of the property is set to `true`, you can also use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定是否选中 控件。Use this property to determine whether the control is checked. 此属性还可用于以编程方式设置 控件的状态。This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性确定 控件的状态。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the state of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 属性的值在向服务器发送期间更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes between posts to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性的值在向服务器的各次发送之间更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. 此事件不会将该页回发到服务器，除非 属性设置为 `true`。This event does not post the page back to the server unless the property is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须在向服务器的各次发送过程中保留一些值才能使此事件正常工作。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application)。For more information about handling events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件的 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将每个代码示例复制到具有 .aspx 扩展名的空文本文件中。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

span.span: if the posted content is different from the last posting; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 方法检查 控件的回发数据是否与以前的值不同; 如果是，则加载内容并返回 `true`。The method checks if the postback data of the control is different from its previous value, and if so, loads the content and returns `true`.

param.span: 包含控件的已保存视图状态值的对象。

span.span: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的 控件的视图状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法从 方法保存的上一个页请求还原 对象的视图状态信息。The method restores view-state information for the object from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

abstract member OnCheckedChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnCheckedChanged : EventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 控件的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the control.

summary.span: 这使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性的值在向服务器的各次发送之间更改时，将引发 事件。The event is raised when the value of the property changes between posts to the server. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须在向服务器的各次发送过程中保留一些值才能使此事件正常工作。A control must persist some values between posts to the server for this event to work correctly. 确保为此控件启用了视图状态。Be sure that view state is enabled for this control. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application)For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application) 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为 控件的 事件指定和编写处理程序。The following example demonstrates how to specify and code the handler for the event of a control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code samples use the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将每个代码示例复制到具有 .aspx 扩展名的空文本文件中。Each code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/CS/checkboxcheckedchanged2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged2/VB/checkboxcheckedchanged2vb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Invokes the method when the posted data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 如果 控件的已发布数据发生更改， 方法将调用 方法。The method invokes the method if the posted data for the control has changed. 如果 `true` 属性，则验证在 属性中设置的控件。If the property is `true`, the controls that are set in the property are validated.

Protected Overrides Function SaveViewState () As Object

summary.span: 在页回发到服务器后，将更改保存到 视图状态。

span.span: Saves the changes to the view state since the time the page was posted back to the server.

returns.span: 包含 的视图状态更改的对象；如果对象没有任何关联视图状态，则为 。

span.span: The object that contains the changes to the view state; otherwise, if no view state is associated with the object, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。The method is used primarily by control developers. 视图状态是服务器控件属性的值的累计。View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties. 这些值自动放置在服务器控件的 属性中，该属性是 类的实例。These values are automatically placed in the property for the server control, which is an instance of the class. 然后，将此属性的值保存到服务器控件生命周期的保存状态阶段之后的字符串对象。This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save-state stage of the server control's life cycle. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 页生命周期概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Page Life Cycle Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178472(v=vs.100)). 保存视图状态时，此字符串对象将作为存储在隐藏的 HTML 输入元素中的变量返回给客户端。When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in a hidden HTML input element. 创作自定义服务器控件时，可以通过重写 并修改服务器控件的 属性来提高效率。When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding the and modifying the property for your server control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zt27tfhy(v=vs.100))和[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/zt27tfhy(v=vs.100)) and [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置与 关联的文本标签。

span.span: Gets or sets the text label associated with the .

value.span: 与 关联的文本标签。

span.span: The text label associated with the .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定与 控件关联的文本标签。Use this property to specify the text label associated with the control. 此属性还可用于以编程方式获取与 控件关联的文本标签。This property can also be used to programmatically get the text label associated with the control. > [!CAUTION] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，其中可能包括恶意客户端脚本。This control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 在应用程序中显示可执行脚本、SQL 语句或其他代码之前，请检查从该客户端发送的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供输入请求验证功能来阻止用户输入中的脚本和 HTML。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 还提供验证服务器控件以评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在 Web 窗体应用程序中使用事件](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application)。For more information, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](/dotnet/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定与 控件关联的文本标签。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the text label associated with the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/CS/checkboxcheckedchangedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CheckBoxCheckedChanged#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CheckBoxCheckedChanged/VB/checkboxcheckedchangedvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the text label associated with the control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性指定与 控件关联的文本标签的对齐方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the text label associated with the control. 您可以指定文本标签是显示在复选框的右侧还是左侧。You can specify whether the text label appears to the right or left of the check box. 使用 属性指定标签文本。Use the property to specify the label text. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性来显示复选框右侧的文本标签。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the text label to the right of the check box. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). summary.span: 获取或设置在 控件回发到服务器时导致验证的控件组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server.

value.span: 在 控件回发到服务器时引发验证的控件组。

span.span: The group of controls for which the causes validation when it posts back to the server.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用验证组可以将页上的验证控件分配给特定类别。Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category. 每个验证组都可以独立于页面上的其他验证组进行验证。Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page. 使用 属性可指定 控件回发到服务器时所导致验证的验证组的名称。Use the property to specify the name of the validation group for which the control causes validation when it posts back to the server. 仅当 "" 属性的值设置为 "`true`时， 属性才有效果。The property has an effect only when the value of the property is set to `true`. 如果为 属性指定值，则当 控件回发到服务器时，只会验证属于指定组的验证控件。When you specify a value for the property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 如果未指定 的值，并且 属性设置为 `true`，则当控件回发到服务器时，将验证该页上未分配给验证组的所有验证控件。If you do not specify a value for the and the property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).
